text: @InscrutableTed Whatever amount you would like to give, please donate that to https://t.co/OYq1BnCa8C. They need it more! Thanks -@j4cob
@die_sel_cat @BlockYaccyaUYO yes, I will probably do this in the future. Right now subscriptions are top priority, though.
@blocktogether The slowness should be fixed. Let me know if it is slow for you! - @j4cob
@die_sel_cat @BlockYaccyaUYO You can visit the Actions page and see if any are still 'pending,' but that can be hard with long lists.
@J_Arcane @infinite_ammo @Lekonish BTW, please do report bugs. I'm actively working on improving it. -@j4cob
Block Together is running slow today. @j4cob needs to tune the database. Sorry for the inconvenience, will fix.
@POPOP654 You're welcome, I am glad to help.
@HenkPoley Right: that's spam (or SEO), not harassment. Block Together is intended to help with harassment.
@HenkPoley Probably not on the horizon since that's more of an anti-spam than anti-harassment feature. But you are welcome to fork the code!
Also in https://t.co/B13BFrk4Uw v0.5: If you have a long Actions page, it's broken into multiple pages, thanks to @BooDooPerson.
Also in https://t.co/B13BFrk4Uw v0.5: My Unblocks has been merged into Actions.
https://t.co/B13BFrk4Uw v0.5 released: more reliable egg blocking; Block All works right for long lists; Lists include follow counts & age.
@mgpcoe @GlennF @oolon @adriarichards @travelingheidi @iroc Would love your help, lots of work to do. https://t.co/ERP6Vkxq79
@oolon @adriarichards @mgpcoe @GlennF @travelingheidi Subscriptions are coming soon: https://t.co/hu32BWKhui. More details on C.o.Trust?
@JLSigman the idea being that you can more easily report abuse from the desktop UI?
When clicking screen names in Block Together, do you want to link to Twitter Desktop or Twitter Mobile? Mobile = faster, but fewer features.
On Android, to get Notifications only from 'People you follow' visit Settings -> @ account_name -> Notifications timeline. @blocktogether
@mike3k Thanks for the feedback! I chose mobile because it loads faster if you're clicking lots of links, but will consider changing.
Remember: Sometimes during a bad harassment campaign it can help to set Notifications to only 'People you follow.' http://t.co/rQSTLfD9Er
Also coming soon to Block Together: Block lists will include account age, number of tweets, following, followers, and maybe more!
Coming soon to Block Together: ongoing block list subscriptions. Please review the design doc and give feedback! https://t.co/hu32BWKhui
@Spacekatgal @10rdBen The My Blocks page does show your total from the Twitter API, not just blocks made by Block Together.
Version 0.3 released today includes: paged blocks by @BooDooPerson; UTF8 support; Ability to unblock. https://t.co/B13BFrk4Uw
Version 0.2 of https://t.co/m89L5vn9AW, released just now, includes "Block accounts w/ <15 followers," thanks to @BooDooPerson.
@brandonnn @coleott @ADAMATOMIC Yep, that makes a lot of sense.
@coleott @ADAMATOMIC @brandonnn Yep! Gotta do a deploy later today for that feature to be live. Glad to hear you're looking out for it!
New release today: Easier first-time signup; display user names on Actions page; handle deactivation; more robust new account blocking.
Previous technical difficulties with 'block new accounts (< 7 days)' are fixed  (tweeting 2nd time because self-reply hidden from timeline).
@blocktogether This is now fixed.
Having some technical difficulties with the 'block new accounts (< 7 days)' feature. Some may go unblocked until I fix it; apologies.
@AngryBlackLady But later visits to Notifications tab should be purged. And I'm particularly interested in fixing missed new accounts.
@AngryBlackLady In my testing I found that even w/ instant blocks, notifications happen (unless I turn on 'replies from people I follow').
@AngryBlackLady Sorry about the ones that slip through! Please do send examples when they happen and I'll see what I can improve.
@NoRedditBots @blauralum Yep, that's what it looks like from here.
@gewt Thanks again for the report, this is exactly what a beta is for! :-)
@gewt Gonna do a quick-fix that just increases the cycle time, and go to bed.
@gewt So it pulls in blocks that still look like they are pending even though a different callback is about to block them.
@gewt Aha, I think I've found the source of the problem. The next queue-processing chunk happens before the previous completes.
@gewt Is this making your client unusable? Considering short-term remedies that would still leave new account auto-blocks functioning.
@gewt Interesting. I think the bug was latent, this release tickled it by unblocking the queue.
@gewt Thanks for the report! Just rolled back the latest release, which introduced this. Let me know if fixed?
@gewt what's up?
Block faster with shortcuts in Twitter for web: Type 'j' or 'k' to select a tweet, 'b' for block dialog, ‚èé to block. http://t.co/Qls7IIEnS4
@blauralum Check out @NoRedditBots' list on @blocktogether: https://t.co/bvJ0sPFkkq
@RBraceySherman It looks like that account dates from 2012. Sorry about that! Future features could filter eggs, low followers, etc.
Pushed a release today. Now if a new user @-replies you and you unblock, Block Together will not re-block. https://t.co/B13BFr31Sw
